summary: ALL OF A SUDDEN 3 OF 4 TIRES WERE NOT HOLDING AIR.  SLOWLY DEFLATING REQUIRING AT LEAST WEEKLY INFLATION.  TOOK VEHICLE TO TIRE SHOP WHERE IT WAS DISCOVERED THAT THE ALUMINUM/CHROME WHEELS WHICH CAME ON THE VEHICLE WERE DETERIORATING, MAKING AN AIR-TIGHT SEAL IMPOSSIBLE.  WILL THIS CONDITION ULTIMATELY AFFECT THE INTEGRITY OF THE WHEEL?  CONTACTED DAIMLER/CHRYSLER AND THEY RESPONDED "...,YOUR REQUEST FOR CONSIDERATION IN THIS MATTER MUST BE DECLINED," AS THE VEHICLE IS OUT OF THE MANUFACTURER'S WARRANTY PERIOD.*JB
